name: Cyber Fraud Detection
description: Techniques for detecting and preventing online fraud and financial cybercrimes.

cards.title: Identity Theft Investigation
cards.description: Tracking and dismantling digital identity fraud schemes.
bulletpoints: Analyze phishing tactics used in identity theft
Use OSINT tools to trace fraudulent accounts and transactions
Deploy behavioral biometrics to detect unauthorized access

cards.title: Payment Fraud Analysis & Detection
cards.description: Identifying fraudulent financial transactions across online platforms.
bulletpoints: Use AI and machine learning to detect abnormal payment patterns
Investigate money laundering techniques in cryptocurrency transactions
Analyze credit card fraud and digital payment fraud trends
